title: How to auto win lane as Xayah vs Lucian
body:
Call Rakan over to your side, tell him how much you love and appreciate him, and how much he means to you. Kiss him if you so choose, and then viciously mock Lucian for having no one and nothing and being unable to protect the one person in his life that mattered to him. He'll be so sad and broken that he can't go on fighting and just gives up on his miserable little existence like the pathetic human worm he is. 

https://68.media.tumblr.com/11f237820a80bcde1fa916acdea01076/tumblr_oo80bnTTgy1thr4hso1_1280.jpg
